Valheim Map Combiner.summary: Takes save files, combines the explored areas and pins from them, then updates the map in each save file with the combined map.

Advanced Signs.summary: Lets you customize sign text font and position as well as sign size, and use rich text tags on signs.

VHVR.summary: This mod adds VR support to Valheim using OpenVR and SteamVR Unity integration.

LogoChanger.summary:
Changes the main menu logo.
Suggested by Raelaziel

Valheim VRM.summary:
This mod allows you to replace the Valheim player model with any VRM model!
VRMs are humanoid avatars developed based on the GLTF format, and can be handled mainly by games created with Unity.
You can replace any model in VRM format, so you can play with any avatar you want!

Compass.summary: Adds a customizable compass to the HUD that shows nearby map marker directions.

Valheim GameBoy.summary: Experience nostalgia with the GameBoy emulator

Item Drawers.summary: A mass storage mod for all your Resin collecting needs.

Saitama (One Punch Man) Texture.summary: Replaces the Troll Armour with Saitama's outfit from One Punch Man.

4 Person Longhouse.summary: This is a perfect longhouse for 4 players. Comes with 2 bedrooms, a crafting area, a forging area, a storage area and 2 teleports.

Surtling Helm.summary: The viking afterlife is cool, but chopping down one tree at a time while dodging Greydwarf ambushes gets tiring. The Surtling Helm throws away all that silly balance and pacing, cranks it up to 13, and lets you rain nuclear death across the land.

Backpack.summary: Adds a customizable backpack to your player character with a configurable weight modifier, allowing you to both carry more things and potentially more weight.

True Vikings.summary:
True vikings gameplay.
No map.
No portals.
No forsaken power.

No lens dirt.summary: Removes the lens dirt texture from the camera.

Display Day and Time in HUD.summary: Simple UI mod to display the in-game day & time in the HUD above the minimap.

ServerPasswordHelper.summary:
This mod does two things.
FIrst, it adds a '+password'' command line argument for writing the server password.
For example: "C:\Valheim\valheim.exe" +connect <yourServer:port> +password <serverPassword>
The password is then sent automatically to the server.
Secondly, it remembers the last IP-adress written i

Serverside Simulations.summary: Run world and monster simulations on a dedicated server.

Tombstone Tracker.summary: Adds every tombstone to the map, along with the owner's name.

Stone Watch Tower.summary: Tall stone tower with a perch on top

Built-up world.summary: World save on the Skyrim seed. If you want to play a role-playing game with friends or just don't like walking on an empty map. Many buildings from different authors (I will definitely indicate). Each biome and boss has its own set of buildings, matching the style, connected by portals.

Forward Operation Base.summary: This small build is great to place when exploring with all the comforts of home! Dont just place a portal place this instead you wont regret it!

AutoPickupSelector.summary:
This mod aims to make it easy to select which items that should be picked up automatically by your character.
It replaces the Trophy tab with a clickable list of all materials and trophies that lets you turn autopickup on or off.

Item Auto Pickup Ignorer.summary: Allows the user to define a list of items which should not be automatically picked up.

DodgeOnDoubleTap.summary:
This mod gives you the ability to do a dodge roll by double tapping in either direction.
The dodge still consumes stamina in the same way as before.
The timing intervals is configurable.

Wolf Breeding Tower.summary: A Tower with the sole purpose of breeding wolves continuously (Boars also work, if you can get them into the tower :P)

ValheimAthleticsSkill.summary: The mod is successor to AthleticsSkill by spacechase0 (https://www.nexusmods.com/valheim/mods/30). It adds multilanguage support and the opportunity to gain progress by pulling wagon.

Food Menu.summary:
With RandyKnapps permission I am using his Jam food engine to build more food items to add to valheim!

This adds various new edible recipes to your game

A Little Help.summary: Makes it a little easier to get back to your body if you keep dying.

Seed Totem.summary: Place a Seed Totem in your fields to automatically plant seeds around it. Give the totem a whack to harvest all plants around it.

Hard Bosses.summary: This mod adds a few stages to the bosses to make them more challenging.

Bronze Buckler clipping fix.summary: Bronze buckler no longer clips with padded armor arm piece.

Enhanced Potions.summary:
Enhanced Potions adds new powerful mead bases and potions in Valheim.

It currently adds 2 sets of mead base and potions:
- Bifröst's apozem: Allows unrestricted Portal use for a period.
- Megingjord's extract: Gives the drinker a god's strength for a period. You can carry +250 more weight.

glaive.summary: replacing the halberd with a glaive

Ship Navigator.summary: Make ship steering easier with this mod. It consists of a toggleable auto-steering mode, automatically turning the ship to the direction you`re viewing while clicking or holding the right button. The ship will keep this course after button has been released. It also comes with a Front and Top camera modes for a better overview.

Craftable Chain.summary: Adds a crafting recipe for the chain. Needs 2 iron and a forge at level 4.

The Abyss (ship).summary: This is a huge ship we designed within the games building integrity limits, but advanced building modes have been used to help position and rotate the building materials outside their usual axis of rotation.

Just a simple Angelic Halo.summary: Replaces the model for the Iron Helmet to Angelic Halo, only the mesh and texture changes, nothing else is touched.

World of Valheim - Zones.summary: World of Valheim - Zones is a plugin that adds "Zones" to the server. Each zone can be defined by a config file and can have the following: Enforced PVP on (with PVP on) / on (with PVP off) / off (Client Control). And also Enforced map visibility On (with show position) / on (with do not show position) / off (Client Control)

World of Valheim - SSC.summary: World of Valheim  - Server Side Characters gives the server control of the users character file.

Cooking Station Tweaks.summary: Lets you add more slots to cooking stations, cause cooked items to auto pop when cooked or simply prevent over-cooking of items.

Dragonsreach Buildshare.summary: This is  a .vbuild file for the Dragonsreach Build I have completed.

Aegis - The Enchanted Goblin Ward.summary: Aegis is a powerful goblin shield which provides the user with a slowly regenerating forcefield on block, the same forcefield cast by goblin shamans. On block, it releases a shockwave which knocks back the attacker, flinging them in the direction of your choosing. This shield is intended to be used like a tower shield, and is perfect for tanking!

MedinsHouse.summary: A simple house with all the place you need

Valheim Trash Can.summary: Add a trashcan, which will instantly remove completed items.

Red Katana.summary: Replaces the silver sword for Red Katana

Cane Church.summary: A church made entirely of wood.

JK - Loki Helmet.summary: Just a simple mesh tweak to make the drake helm kinda look like a loki helmet.

Extended Wishbone Tweaks.summary: This mod provides the ability for the Wishbone to find Copper, Tin and now Deathsquitos, as well as configurable distances for Silver, Buried Chests and Mud Piles.

Map Coordinates Display.summary: Show map coordinates for the player and/or the cursor position when the map is open.

Hardcore.summary:
Provides 3 simple toggles when creating a new character:
- Hardcore: If a character flagged as hardcore dies, the user is automatically logged out and the character deleted.
- Skip Intro: Enabling this skips the text scroll and Valkyrie flight upon initial login.
- Disable Tutorials: Enabling this prevents Hugin's tutorial messages.

Surtling Core Overclocking.summary: Factorio-style modules for Valheim! Overclock your Kilns, Smelters and Blast Furnaces with Surtling Cores.

UBG's Weapon Management Mod.summary: Three features in this mod: Do not unequip weapons when hitting their hotbar number, keep weapons stowed on back when equipping a new weapon (and switch back and forth easily), and be able to open doors/chests/etc while wielding a tool.

QIYE__Garbage disposal.summary:
Rush items modification from virtuacode
Waste disposal, easy to remove excess materials

Old Epic creature loot - No longer neede.summary: OLD MOD - No longer supported This is a challenge mode configuration for RandyKnapps Epic Loot and Tykea's Creature Loot Level that sets loot tables for mobs up to level 8*, and then increases the world difficulty considerablly.  The greater the risk the better the loot.  Highest level mobs drop the best loot (including legendaries)!

MJOLNIR - Thor's Hammer.summary: Mjölnir is a hammer which deals a very low range to a very high range in lightning damage per hit, it also inflicts a shock degen which takes away 2% of the target's maximum health every tick. Targets are struck by lightning on hit and on death, "popping" on death with an explosion of blood and gore. It has the Frostner model and icon.

The Real Deal.summary: A true portal hub in all its glory!

Skyheim - Valheim Magic.summary: Skyheim is a magic mod aimed at providing balanced progression and a reason to go back and slay bosses. Each boss drops a crafting ingredient that can be used to craft and upgrade runes that will allow you to cast a variety of spells both beneficial and destructive.

Bearded Blackmetal Axe.summary: I found the vanilla black metal axe too weirdly shaped, so I remodelled it into a more accurate shape (with liberties).

A Valheim Adventure - The Black Dragon's.summary: You are going on an adventure to avoid the destruction of the worlds. Just that.

HimejiCastle.summary:
I tried as best I could to build a replica of the Japanese castle "Himeji". The interior is fitted out to accommodate at least 4 players. There are 5 levels: The entrance, the trophy room, the kitchens, the workshop, the dormitories and the attic.
.vbuild File Size : 124Ko ; Flatten : (25, 25)

Sailing Skill.summary: Adds Sailing Skill to the game

Save My Server IP.summary: When you use 'Join IP' to connect a character to a server, this mod simply saves that IP or Domain information for that character and loads it the next time to join IP with that character.

Toggleable Transparent Sails.summary: A fully-configurable dynamic pixelated transparent sail to see where you are going. With Toggle HotKey.

Cheaper Stone Pieces.summary: This mod adjusts the building costs of stone building pieces to be relative to their size. On average building, stone structures will now be cheaper than before, but better balanced.

Val-Hollywood.summary: Welcome to Valhollywood.  Land of vbuilds.

Potted Plants.summary: This mod adds some potted plants to the game to add some more detail to your builds.

Enhanced Harpoons.summary: Improves harpoon functionality allowing the user to customize all aspects of the harpoon. Make enemies pull in closer, faster, slower, increase the distance you can travel before a harpoon breaks. Fixes that annoyance that occurs when trying to catch serpents and they keep breaking out.

Glowing Mushroom Remover.summary: Ever accidentally spawned a BEAUTIFUL glowing mushroom but got tired of looking at it? This mod allows you to PERMANENTLY remove them!

Iron Sword blade reshape.summary: I found the vanilla iron sword blade too triangular, so I remodelled the blade and pommel into a more accurate shape.

Battle Axe (Battleaxe) reshape.summary: I found the vanilla Battleaxe too weirdly shaped, so I remodelled the head into a more accurate shape.

More Stacks.summary: This mod adds a number of new placeable item stacks for metals and wood as well as for treasure with a bonus to comfort when built.

Baraphor's Unity Mod Utils.summary: This utility provides two helper scripts for making prefabs for Valheim in Unity. An icon renderer and a project setup button that will set up all the project references when things are exported from uTinyRipper.

Bronze Stonecutting.summary: This changes the stonecutter bench to require bronze instead of iron.  Build the castle of your dreams... slightly sooner!

Mofo's Player Stats In Range.summary: PlayerStats will show health data for all nearby players within a given range of you.

The Watch Tower.summary: This is a round Watch Tower.

Kite Shield.summary: Serpent Scale Shield reshape and retexture so it looks like a 10-11th century norman kite shield.

Plant Grow Time.summary:
Modify the grow time of default game plants

NOTE: From my understanding this mod will reduce the time in combination of other mods that control grow times, this is because they all effect the Plant piece

Areas.summary: Allows to finely tune difficulty based on areas. It's in Alpha and won't work well.

TorchesEternal.summary: A HarmonyX Mod that automatically adds wood to nearby fireplaces.

Mofo's Prayers for Rain (MMWeatherMod).summary: This mod is a simple mod that allows allows the player to /pray in the chat window to ask Odin to bless them with clear weather. It does not always work, sometimes you will anger Odin, and you must be seated and outside (or on a boat).

Cart Support.summary: Lets nearby players support cart movement, reducing the effective mass of the cart by a percentage for each nearby player.

Blackmetal Shield chain removal.summary: Gently asked the blacksmith to remove the chains from the shield.

The Great Hall.summary: Great Hall with Docks and Courtyard

Build Expansion.summary: This mod allows to expand the Hammer build tables to support mods that add new pieces.

Notification Tweaks.summary: Lets you customize in-game notification display, including number of notifications to show at once, fade speed, font size, etc. Also consolidates similar notifications.

Mofo's Random Player Spawn Locations.summary: Randomizes a players first spawn location on every map started. Players will no longer (most likely) be starting in the center of the map and their spawn locations will be different from others (assuming they're running this mod too).

Viking Longhouse (By EclipsE).summary:
Sharing a Viking Longhouse building.
Look the images.

Custom Building Items.summary: Custom items for building! Some custom made ones, some items from the game that previously weren't buildable. I will be adding to this pack over time.

Inspect Inventory.summary: Mod allows your players on server to inspect other people's inventory in close range

4StoryMaze.summary: VBuild for maze build. 80m x 64m x 4 levels

Teleport Activation Distance Fix.summary: The modification allows you to change the activation distance for the visual effects of the portal. Preventing unwanted activation of portal visual effects by the player and, as a result, improves gaming performance.

Prequel to The Real Deal.summary: This is something I made and got inspired to create The Real Deal mod.

Gratuitous Violence - Weapon Mod.summary: Haemophilia is a sword which inflicts powerful bleeding attacks that deal flat and percentage max health damage over time. The sword's base damage is significantly lower than other weapons like the Porcupine, but it makes up for its low damage with incredible boss killing potential. Enemies pop on death, dealing 30% of their health to enemies.

Timed Torches.summary: Tired of having to add resin to the tens or hundreds of torches lighting up your viking village? This mod takes care of that by allowing you to set a time-span during which they are always on, even if they burned all their fuel. Never let your base go dark again!

EasyFarm.summary: This mod let's you plant multiple crops at the same time with automatic perfect distancing.

(PvP) Battlegrounds - Avernus Reach.summary:
Test 3, world is still in development for Avernus Gaming.

PvP Centric

Special thanks to all of Avernus, especially Eman and INoriety!

Server Side Chat Filter.summary:
Chat Filter is a *server-side* only HarmonyX mod for Valheim.

This mod filters profanities and censors them in the in game chat.

It censors the words for every one else in the server but the person who wrote the message.

MyBase.summary: Small All in One Base idea

WInd Mill Fix.summary:
This modification allows you to turn off the rotation of the propellers of the wind mill while it is not running. This eliminates the computation required to rotate the blades of a windmill. As a result, gaming performance is greatly improved.
Also this modification allows you to change the volume of the windmill.

Atos Arrows.summary: Adds several new arrows into the game. Expands arrow progression for fighting tougher enemies!

SlaveGreylings.summary:
The Eikthyr forest are whispering about Greylings disappearing nearby Barg & Morg basecamp.

Soon the enslavement can be perfected.

Toasty Torches.summary: Makes torches dry you off quicker and keeps you from getting cold at night.

Rooty's Armory.summary: Nice armory full equipped with everything you need for battle.

CFaS - Custom Fireplace and Smelter.summary: allows user to customly set fuel,ore,usage per second, usage per product etc. for fireplaces and smelters of all categories separatly

Better Swimming.summary: Makes swimming less of a pain.
